messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How far am I from the Golden Gate Bridge

I can help with that—just need your current location. Could you please provide your latitude and longitude (or allow location sharing)? Once I have your coordinates, I’ll calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.
I don't have that info right now.

To compute the distance, I need your current latitude and longitude. If you’re not sure how to get those, you can:

• Open maps on your phone or computer and tap/ click on your location to see coordinates.  
• Use a GPS/location app to display your lat/long.  

Once you have those numbers, just let me know and I’ll calculate how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge.
Can you use your tools to figure it out?

I’m not able to detect your location automatically. To calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge, I’ll need your current latitude and longitude. Could you share those coordinates? If you don’t have exact values, even a rough estimate will let me give you an approximate distance.
I don't have that info, sorry.

I’m sorry, but without at least an approximate latitude and longitude (or a specific address/city), I can’t compute the distance to the bridge. If you can share:

• Your current lat/long (even rounded to two decimals)  
• Or the city/area you’re in  

I can then calculate how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge.
